summary: Four long-time friends take a two day road trip from Moscow to Odessa to attend a friend's party. While traveling, they discuss with one another the negatives about being married men.
cast: Leonid Barats|Aleksandr Demidov|Kamil Larin|Rostislav Khait|Nina Ruslanova|Zhanna Friske|Konstantin Chepurin|Anna Kasatkina|Sayart Abadzhyan|Artyom Fadeev|Sergey Nikonenko|Nonna Grishaeva|Maksim Nikitin|Natalya Osadchuk|Olga Lezhneva|Polina Voynevich|Fyodor Dobronravov|Marina Korolkova|Igor Bortnik|Aleksandr Uman|Maksim Vitorgan|Yuliya Pyznar|Aleksey Agranovich|Artyom Smola|Elena Podkaminskaya|Veronika Amirkhanova|Valeriya Godnaya|Aleksandr Zuev|Anastasiya Pronina|Mikhail Solodovnik|Viktor Dobronravov|Alisa Pesotskaya|Marina Belaya|Konstantin Spasskiy|Slava Schoot|Vladimir Kebin|Viktoriya Efimova-Shestakovskaya|Anatoliy Morozov|Ekaterina Evsyukova|Sergey Shnyryov|Natalya Sigova|Valentina Zubchenko|Mariya Bondarenko|Aleksandr Gerasimchuk|Yuliya Sules|Elena Doronina|Grigoriy Bagrov|Sergey Neudachin|Anastasiya Medvedeva|Elena Ostroverkhova|Andrey Makarevich|Oleg Menshikov|Aleksey Kortnev|Vasiliy Utkin|Mariya Rubtsova|Tikhon Buznikov|Irina Derienko|Anna Shtukaturova|Galateya Kazakova|Vasilisa Voronina|Grigoriy Malikov|Artyom Malikov|Nikolay Malikov|Valeriy Ivakov|Aleksandr Noskov|Svetlana Kharlap|Maksim Andryushchenko|Bi-2|Polya Polyakova|Andrey Zvonkov
title: O chyom govoryat muzhchiny
